The Microsoft AI for Good Lab is expanding to Nairobi, Kenya, and we're looking for data science and machine learning professionals to join our new office. 

The lab's mission is to use data and AI to address some of the greatest challenges facing humanity. At this office, we will work on issues that will improve societies and environments with a focus on climate change, food security, and public health.  

We're preferably looking for candidates with experience in academic research and knowledge about deep learning applied to computer vision and satellite imagery.

We currently three positions open:

- Principal Research Scientist: https://careers.microsoft.com/us/en/job/1441697/Principal-Research-Scientist
- Senior Research Scientist: https://careers.microsoft.com/us/en/job/1441600/Senior-Research-Scientist
- Research Scientist II: https://careers.microsoft.com/us/en/job/1441597/Research-Scientist-ll

The fastest way to be considered is to apply directly through the links.

Follow me for future openings.
